[Home](./index.md) &gt; [paratype](./paratype.md) &gt; [RecordMethods](./paratype.recordmethods.md) &gt; [set](./paratype.recordmethods.set.md)

## RecordMethods.set() method

Returns a copy of the current object with the specified property merged in

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set<K extends keyof T>(key: K, value: T[K]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | K | Key of the property to merge in |
|  value | T\[K\] | Property value to merge in |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

## Remarks

If the resulting object would be equal to the current instance, then the current instance is returned instead.
